root.name: Ferrari Grand Prix Challenge
root.description: NES/FamicomThe NES/Famicom version was developed by System 3 and published by Acclaim in the United States and Europe and Coconuts Japan published it in Japan.Genesis/Mega DriveThe Genesis/Mega Drive version was developed by Aisystem Tokyo and published by Flying Edge in the United States and Europe and Varie published it in Japan. Satoru Nakajima leant his name to the game in Japan.Game BoyThe Game Boy version was developed by System 3 and published by Acclaim in the United States and by Coconuts Japan in Japan.

similar_games.game: Formula One World Championship: Beyond the Limit
